titleStmt.title: A nose-gay for the House of Commons. Made up of the stincking flowers of their seven yeares labours, gathered out of the garden of their new reformation. ... / By Mercurius Melancholicus.
titleStmt.author: Mercurius Melancholicus, fl. 1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the signe of, You may goe looke,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
